Battle Cards
View On FortressMaximus.io

Thermal Weaponry

  1. Does Inverted supersede other effects that look at pips? Or can the order be chosen? For example, Inverted with Thermal Weaponry, could a blue pip add to pierce before changing into an orange pip?
    Battle icon colors do not exist simultaneously. When Battle Icons are made to change colors, it happens instantaneously.
  2. What happens to Thermal Weaponry when Inverted! is in play?
    Then your orange battle icons would add to your pierce but not your blues.
